trans-unit.source: Represents an XML element that contains the settings for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service, as well as endpoints that expose the service.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceElement" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceElement" /> class.
The type of the service to be instantiated.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceElement" /> class with the type of the service to be instantiated.
Gets or sets a string that contains the behavior name of the behavior to be used to instantiate the service.
The behavior name of the behavior to be used to instantiate the service.
trans-unit.target: Der Name des Verhaltens, mit dem der Dienst instanziiert werden soll.

trans-unit.source: The behavior name must be in scope at the point the service is defined.
trans-unit.target: Der Verhaltensname muss sich bei der Dienstdefinition im Gültigkeitsbereich befinden.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Der Standardwert ist eine leere Zeichenfolge.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of endpoints exposed by this service.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElementCollection" /> that contains one or more endpoints exposed by this service.
trans-unit.target: Eine <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElementCollection" />, die einen oder mehrere Endpunkte enthält, die vom Dienst verfügbar gemacht werden.

trans-unit.source: Each endpoint has its own address and binding.
trans-unit.target: Jeder Endpunkt hat eine eigene Adresse und eine eigene Bindung.

trans-unit.source: All bindings used within the configuration file must be defined in the scope of the file.
trans-unit.target: Alle Bindungen innerhalb der Konfigurationsdatei müssen im Gültigkeitsbereich der Datei definiert sein.

trans-unit.source: Gets a configuration element that specifies the host of this service instance.
A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.HostElement" /> that specifies the host of this service instance.
trans-unit.target: Ein <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.HostElement" />, das den Host dieser Dienstinstanz angibt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unique name of this service.
The unique name of this service.
